description:
The commander of the initial Buff Clan search expedition that discovered the planet Solo. Gije is a friend and former fiance of Karala`s, and hence is gravely concerned with her safety after she heads to the planet Solo. Initially he leads multiple operations to rescue Karala, and is later sent by Harulu to the Buff Clan homeworld to perform further study of the Ide.
Source: Wiki
name: Gije Zaral
